attributes.action: Allow small businesses to be given the grant in special circumstances.
attributes.additional_details: This is an unfair policy that white washes small business that just fall out of the regulations for the grant. we are important too, we vote! allot of us are important parts of our community and as such should not be dismissed. we need this grant just as much as other businesses. this policy discriminates all other small business.
attributes.background: we want the government to change the regulations for the small business grant. small business that started before the pandemic, and are entitled to get business rates regardless of what date they applied. should be granted the grant.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend grants immediately to small businesses outside of SBRR: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305024

Extend £10,000 small business grant to SMEs that do not have a property: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304161

Provide all small companies not entitled to existing support a grant of £25,000: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316889
